Package dataaccess

Class AbstractDAO<T>

java.lang.Object
dataaccess.AbstractDAO<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Placeholder for one of the 3 objects that we work with: Client, Product, Order.
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientDAO, OrderDAO, ProductDAO
public class AbstractDAO<T>
extends java.lang.Object
AbstractDAO is an abstract class that generates and executes SQL queries that are given as commands in the input text file. Contains all the shared query formats between the 3 objects: Client, Product, Order.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String createDeleteQuery​(java.lang.String name)
    Creates the SQL DELETE query with the given name of the client/product that needs to be deleted.
    java.lang.String createInsertQuery​(java.lang.String values)
    Creates the SQL INSERT query with the given values (the values must have all the fields in the given order in the database with the exception of the id; see the toString() methods in the Client, Product and Order classes).
    private java.util.List<T> createObjects​(java.sql.ResultSet resultSet)
    Transforms the ResultSet which came as a response of a database query into a java object.
    private java.lang.String createSelectQuery​(java.lang.String field)
    Creates the SQL SELECT query based on a simple condition.
    T delete​(java.lang.String name)
    Deletes a client/product from the database.
    T deleteAll()
    Truncates a table.
    T findByName​(java.lang.String name)
    executes a SQL SELECT query based on a given name and returns the found object from the database.
    T insert​(T t)
    Inserts a client/product/order into the database.

    • createSelectQuery

      private java.lang.String createSelectQuery​(java.lang.String field)
      Creates the SQL SELECT query based on a simple condition.
      Parameters:
      field - the database table field which will be checked in the condition
      Returns:
      the created SQL SELECT query

    • createInsertQuery

      public java.lang.String createInsertQuery​(java.lang.String values)
      Creates the SQL INSERT query with the given values (the values must have all the fields in the given order in the database with the exception of the id; see the toString() methods in the Client, Product and Order classes).
      Parameters:
      values - String with all the values that need to be inserted into the database.
      Returns:
      the created SQL INSERT query

    • createDeleteQuery

      public java.lang.String createDeleteQuery​(java.lang.String name)
      Creates the SQL DELETE query with the given name of the client/product that needs to be deleted.
      Parameters:
      name - client's/product's name to be deleted
      Returns:
      the created SQL DELETE query

    • findByName

      public T findByName​(java.lang.String name)
      executes a SQL SELECT query based on a given name and returns the found object from the database.
      Parameters:
      name - client's/product's name to be searched
      Returns:
      the searched object

    • createObjects

      private java.util.List<T> createObjects​(java.sql.ResultSet resultSet)
      Transforms the ResultSet which came as a response of a database query into a java object.
      Parameters:
      resultSet - table of data returned by a SQL query
      Returns:
      a java object from a database entry.

      Parameters:
